channel.title: RuneStream 3.0 Devlopment
channel.description:
[size=30pt]RuneStream 3.0 Dedicated[/size] We Hope To Have It Up March 15th Heyy. Welcome To RuneStream 3.0 First I Would Like To Say This Is A Server With Npc Training Not OBJECT Sorry. Owners: Mod Jamie & The Great D D 3 We Need Coders. ~Features That We Have~ Full Pking With Timers Range Projulties & Pull Back Specials- With Gfx Faceing (No Matter What Way Your Faceing It Does It In Front Of You) Achent Magicks Some Modern Magic-Still Adding More Good Eccomany-No Bullshitting Mods (There Always Serious) Npc Training Npc Attakcing Back Barrows Slayer Fletching Fishing Cooking (Random Burns) -More Comeing Soon.- ~Things We Want To Add~ PestControl Jad Cave-(As Close As We Can Get) Our Own Custome Assult-(Not Like BSI Sorta Like It) Add A Asslut Shop Make The Shop Only Eccept C Wars Tickets Make Barrows Better BSI Pking Place Fun Area-Almost Done. -More Comeing Soon- [u]Moderators[/u] -Mora- -Open Spot- -Open Spot- -Open Spot- We Are Not Accpeting Noob Mods. Mod Applcation
1. What Servers Have You Been Mod On? 2. Proff? 3. Why Do You Wana Be A Mod on Our Server.
~Server Fourms Coder~ -Spot Open- -Spot Open- Server Is About 53.7% Done Client Is 91.7% Done Thanks Hope You Enjoyed.

item.title: RuneStream 3.0 Devlopment
item.dc:creator: @coolpup2233 coolpup2233
item.description:
@coolpup2233 wrote:

  1. What Servers Have You Been Mod On?countless but ill name as many as i can remember… phantomscape.servegame.com, 97.82.189.133, techdeckfriends, and umm i cant remember any more … cause the rest of them were years ago… im 16 right now and ive been on servers and coding since i was 12…
  2. Proff?coolpup111@hotmail.com thats my msn add it and we’ll talk about my proof…
  3. Why Do You Wana Be A Mod on Our Server.cause i feel with my experience that we would make a good community to the server and all the players in it.

thank you for your time,

coolpup2233

Read full topic

item.title: RuneStream 3.0 Devlopment
item.dc:creator: @Khasck Khasck
item.description:
@Khasck wrote:

[size=30pt]RuneStream 3.0 Dedicated[/size]

We Hope To Have It Up March 15th

Heyy. Welcome To RuneStream 3.0
First I Would Like To Say This Is A Server With Npc Training Not OBJECT Sorry.

Owners: Mod Jamie & The Great D D 3

We Need Coders.

~Features That We Have~
Full Pking With Timers
Range Projulties & Pull Back
Specials- With Gfx Faceing (No Matter What Way Your Faceing It Does It In Front Of You)
Achent Magicks
Some Modern Magic-Still Adding More
Good Eccomany-No Bullshitting Mods (There Always Serious)
Npc Training
Npc Attakcing Back
Barrows
Slayer
Fletching
Fishing
Cooking (Random Burns)
-More Comeing Soon.-

~Things We Want To Add~
PestControl
Jad Cave-(As Close As We Can Get)
Our Own Custome Assult-(Not Like BSI Sorta Like It)
Add A Asslut Shop
Make The Shop Only Eccept C Wars Tickets
Make Barrows Better
BSI Pking Place
Fun Area-Almost Done.
-More Comeing Soon-

Moderators

-Mora-
-Open Spot-
-Open Spot-
-Open Spot-

We Are Not Accpeting Noob Mods.

Mod Applcation

1. What Servers Have You Been Mod On? 2. Proff? 3. Why Do You Wana Be A Mod on Our Server.

~Server Fourms Coder~
-Spot Open-
-Spot Open-

Server Is About 53.7% Done
Client Is 91.7% Done

Thanks Hope You Enjoyed.
